definition: to consider oneself as being not as good as the others
ashamed of being inferior (idiom)/to feel inferior to others
to feel ashamed at being inferior (idiom)
to accept wholeheartedly/to embrace/to be won over
lit. to see only the other rider's dust and have no hope of catching up (idiom)/to be far inferior
lit. name is not in vain (idiom); a fully justified reputation/enjoys a well-deserved reputation
to admire
lit. to have no time for civilities (idiom)/fig. not to be outdone/not to yield to one's opponents
to prostrate oneself in admiration (idiom); to adulate sb
to submit cheerfully/to accept willingly (idiom)
to bow before (idiom)/to capitulate
to blush with shame (literary)
to have a whole new level of respect for sb or sth/to sit up and take notice (of sb's improved performance etc)
lit. to retreat three day's march (idiom); fig. to give way in the face of superior strength/a strategic withdrawal
(to gasp) with admiration
however strong you are, there is always someone stronger (idiom)/there is always sth more to learn/never be satisfied to rest on your laurels/there is no room for complacency
